Articles.Content:
Corovaneer Toolshed ltd. presents The Stratosoarer V(anilla)1.

A performance atmospheric craft for circling the globe and unscheduled LKO entry, with aerobatic quality wing (that came to life as a result of blueprints being held upside down at some point of nose-to-tailbeam assembly of another V-wing), and sleek design with a lot of potential for making it less sleek with various payloads and extensions.

Despite (or thanks to) a rather controversial usage of multi-stage air compressors, coupled with a latest software by MechJeb this craft is capable of atmospheric speeding up to 2,4 km\s, with final altitudes of over 100km by 30km. Actual mass of self-propelled payloads that can be carried such distances is unknown, but thought to be enough for reaching Kerbostationary orbit.

As for aerobatics.. my flightstick skills are a bit rusty, hence... a mishap

Craft file (with wings intact! )

http://rghost.ru/45568392
